import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './WordCard.css' import $, { data, get } from 'jquery' function WordCard({ word }) { $('.card').on('click', function () { $('.cardRotate').addClass('backRotate').removeClass('cardRotate') $(this).addClass('cardRotate').removeClass('backRotate') }) return word != null ? (
{word.map((item, idx) => ( <>
))} {/*
*/}
) : null } export default WordCard
